titleStmt.title: Halting stigmatiz'd in a sermon preached to the Honorable House of Commons on the monethly fast day, Octob. 25. 1643. at Margarets Westminster. By Arthur Salvvey, pastour of Severne-stoake in the county of Worcester. Published by order of the said House.
titleStmt.author: Salwey, Arthur, b. 1605 or 6.

titleStmt.title: Halting stigmatiz'd in a sermon preached to the Honorable House of Commons on the monethly fast day, Octob. 25. 1643. at Margarets Westminster. By Arthur Salvvey, pastour of Severne-stoake in the county of Worcester. Published by order of the said House.
titleStmt.author: Salwey, Arthur, b. 1605 or 6.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Christopher Meredith at the Crane in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: With an order to print on verso of first leaf.
Running title reads: A sermon preached at a late fast before the Honourable House of Commons.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
